name: Crazy Bishop
description:
Crazy Bishop has 100 adjustable playing levels based on the strong engine
with very high quality graphics - FOR FREE!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Crazy Bishop is an universal app which supports all of iPhone/iPad!

Adjustable playing strength from 100 levels!
You can choose the strength of the computer from 258 to 2300 in ELO rating.
Level 1 is extremely weak, and Level 100 is extremely difficult to beat!
Crazy Bishop has 100 different levels of play from beginner to expert!

Challenge to win medals by defeating computer!
You will be rewarded to enable changing the board style
and pieces design by collecting medals.


Other Features:
- High resolution Retina Display support
- Human vs Computer, Human vs Human(sharing a single device)
- Computer gives your level evaluation by ELO rating in rating mode,
very useful for tracking your progress
- Let you know your turn by vibration
- Enter and analyze any position you like in edit mode
- Hint facility to improve your game
- Review mode during a game
- Save/Load game records
- Supporting PGN file for both reading and writing
- PGN files can be transferred from your computer over USB cable on the iTunes
- Export game records via e-mail in text format or as a PGN file
- Enable to view full game history in the game record and restart game
from the selected move, which should be very practical for
improving your chess
- Autosaves your current game
